hero.headline: Smart Design.
hero.subtext: IMPAKT Studio focuses on real value. The K in IMPAKT stands for Key Impact – the important and practical impacts that design brings to the brand.

about.headline: We build real value, we don't sell illusions.
about.origin_title: IMPAKT was born for a purpose
about.origin_question: Is your website showing its own identity, or is it just a clone like everyone else?
about.origin_desc: Instead of mass-produced templates, IMPAKT goes deep into brand identity to create unique digital spaces. We help you assert your position and difference, leaving a professional impression and trust from the very first touch.
about.p1: A website is the digital face of the brand. A beautiful face needs to go hand in hand with an intelligent brain to truly bring value.
about.p2: We work with sincerity: Real quotes, Real progress, and Real results. Here, transparency is not a promise, but a principle of our profession.
about.legal_desc: All agreements are concretized by clear contracts. IMPAKT protects your interests through transparency in costs, progress, and the quality of the delivered source code.
about.diff_1_desc: No copying mass templates. Each website is a unique version, created based on brand personality and actual user behavior.
about.diff_2_title: Mastering technology, optimizing from the core
about.diff_2_desc: Eliminating bulky templates. We build websites from the original source code to optimize speed, absolute security, and easy expansion later.
about.transparencyText: Full package quotes, no hidden fees. Consulting solutions according to needs, no redundant features.
about.performanceText: It's not just hand over and done. IMPAKT is committed to technical support and sustainable operation consulting throughout your operation.
about.p3: Whether it's a personal Portfolio or a corporate Website, IMPAKT doesn't just design — we are a partner accompanying your development.

projects.headline: Featured Projects
projects.subheadline: Explore frontend demos built carefully with UI/UX and performance.
projects.p1_desc: Modern sales website, focusing on optimizing user experience and shopping behavior.
projects.p2_desc: Intuitive data management system, supporting fast and accurate decision making.
projects.p3_desc: Minimalist design, highlighting images, typography, and brand personality.

services.headline: Creating unique digital experiences.
services.subline: We design and program full-package websites — from strategy, interface to operation systems — to create sustainable business value.

web.title: Full-Package Website Design & Programming
web.desc: We are responsible for the entire process: brand analysis, unique interface design, and programming the website to optimize performance, SEO, and scalability.

pricing.headline: Website Design Price List
pricing.subheadline: Choose a solution suitable for your scale and business goals.
pricing.pricing_note: * Flexible costs, special offers for student projects and early-stage startups.

starter.name: PERSONAL
starter.desc: For individuals, freelancers needing a Portfolio or basic Landing Page.
features: Concise content, right to the point

business.name: BUSINESS
business.desc: Solutions for small and medium enterprises (SMEs) to build brand prestige.

commerce.name: E-COMMERCE
commerce.desc: Comprehensive online sales system, turning the website into a revenue machine.

process.headline: How we turn ideas into effective products

steps.title: Discovery & Brand Insight
steps.desc: Listening to business goals, analyzing target customers, and brand positioning to build a strategic foundation.

steps.title: Strategy & Wireframe
steps.desc: Building website structure, user experience flow, and content orientation based on analyzed insight.

steps.title: Design & Development
steps.desc: Designing a unique interface according to brand DNA and proceeding with performance-optimized programming.

steps.title: Testing & Optimization
steps.desc: Testing on multiple devices, optimizing speed, SEO, and experience before putting into operation.

steps.title: Handoff & Companion
steps.desc: Instructions for use, technical maintenance, and long-term development support along with the business.

why.title: Why Choose IMPAKT?
why.subheadline: We create unique digital experiences, focusing on real value and sustainable effectiveness.
why.p1_desc: Custom design according to brand identity. Say no to mass templates and copying available samples.
why.p2_desc: Only implement features that truly bring value, helping the website to be neat and goal-optimized.
why.p3_desc: Built according to current needs, clear costs, and easily expanded as the brand develops.
